contentList.content: Testing Testing 1 2 3
New Gith Sword
Astral Binding
When wielded by a githyanki, they cannot be forced to drop this weapon.
Ancient Material
Due to this weapon's extreme durability it grants a +1 on all melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Fiery Slam
Slam your weapon into the ground, dealing fire damage and possibly pushing them away.
Searing Strike
Slice into an enemy, dealing [1] + an additional [3] to them, while you yourself take [2].
Dolor Maior
When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with this weapon, its critical damage is rolled twice and added together.
Force Slam
Slam your weapon into the ground, impacting nearby foes and possibly pushing them away.
Lightning Strike
Lightning strikes all targets within range. Then for 10 turns, you can call down lightning again.
Activate Lightning Strike
Can cast Lightning Strike for 10 turns or until concentration is broken.
Sharp Return
When launched at a target, deal an additional [1] Damage.

Whenever this weapon lands a hit, both target and attacker have to succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or be affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HIDEOUS_LAUGHTER">fits of laughter</LSTag>.

When a creature misses you with an attack, it must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass"> DC</LSTag> [1] Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROZEN">Frozen</LSTag> for [2] turns.
While the wielder is not wearing armour, they receive a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
If the wielder deals Acid, Fire, Lightning, Radiant or Necrotic damage, it becomes <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to that damage type for 2 turns.
Unstable Casting

Due to the shear amount of power in this staff, it has become unstable and hard to control. While active the user suffers -[1] to spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and -[3] to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, but gains a +[2] to spell damage rolls.
Immune to Acid Damage
Immune to Cold Damage
Immune to Fire Damage
Immune to Force Damage
Immune to Lightning Damage
Immune to Necrotic Damage
Immune to Poison Damage
Immune to Psychic Damage
Immune to Radiant Damage
Immune to Thunder Damage

At the start of a round, you can reduce the weapon's additional attack bonus by [1] to increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> by [1].
Affected entity regains [1] at the start of the spellcaster's turn, as long as they remain within [2] of them.
Ripped and Torn
This weapon deals an additional [1] damage against Fiends and Undead.

When you kill an enemy, allies within [1] gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to double your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (minimum 1).
Avernus is Ours!
Forged in the Nine Hells, this weapon grants +1 to melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Infernal Origin
This weapon favors the power of the hells, as such fiends wielding this weapon cannot be forced to drop it.
This weapon ignores Bludgeoning <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag>.
War of the Monsters
Unleash the monster and deal an additional [1] damage to monstrosity type enemies.
Gleamstriker
Deal an additional [1] damage.
Increases <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> to [1].
Float like a butterfly
Increase your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance by [1].
Death's Touch
When dealing Necrotic damage, the wielder deals an additional [1].
A creature hit by this weapon will possibly be afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FAERIE_FIRE">Faerie Fire</LSTag>.
Great Cleave
Swing this corrupt weapon in a large arc to attack up to [1] enemies at once.
Chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shock</LSTag> the wielder, unless it is a construct.
Precisely Woven

This weapon's integration with the Weave siphon's some of a spell damage to make it more precise. While active the user suffers a -[2] to spell damage rolls, but gains an additional +[1] to spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and +[3] to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>.
Caustic Acid
When dealing Acid damage, the wielder deals an additional [1].
Undead Tenacity
Myrkul's Chosen
Deal an additional [1] to all non-undead.

Chance to inflict upon the target a 1d4 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If the attacker still has 50% or more <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, they take [1] themselves.

Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you regain a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or Killing Blow with the Spellthief.
On a Weapon hit, the target takes an extra [1] as long as it isn't a construct or an undead. You also gain [2].
Illithid Superiority
Attacks with this weapon deal an additional [1] damage against any enemy that is NOT an Aberration.
When you Kill a target or get a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
Positive Conduit
While the wielder has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag> weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
While the wielder has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag> weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Titan Weaponry

Instead of its Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, the affected entity adds its Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to Damage and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Precise Aim
Decrease the number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with this bow by the wielder's Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. (Max 2 Reduction)
Life Stealing
Once per turn, you can encase a target in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FAERIE_FIRE">Faerie Fire</LSTag> for [1] turns if you miss an attack against it.
Elemental Punishment
Deals an additional [1] to targets suffering an elemental status condition.
The Enemy Within
Deal an extra [1] to goblin type enemies.
Divine Accuracy
This weapon's divine origins give it a +[1] to melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Githzerai Binding
The Githzerai soul bound within this weapon grant its user <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="COL_GITHZERAI_MIND_TECHNIQUE">Githzerai Mind Barrier</LSTag>.
Binding Tethers
When this weapon lands a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or Killing Blow, it also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOW">Slows</LSTag> nearby creatures.
Forever Aware
You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
Cry of Fear
When this weapon lands a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or Killing Blow, it also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fears</LSTag> nearby creatures.
What Goes Up
This weapon deals an extra [1] damage to when thrown, but deals [2] damage to the wielder in return.
A drow elf wielding this weapon deals an additional [1] against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> targets or targets standing on Difficult Terrain.

Strike out at all nearby foes, making separate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack rolls</LSTag> against each target. Attack Rolls are made without your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Think Fast
When this weapon lands a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or Killing Blow, possibly apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FAERIE_FIRE">Faerie Fire</LSTag> nearby foes.
Bound Blade
The wielder adds their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> twice to both damage and attack rolls with this weapon. +[1]
Yeenoghu's Gift

Hitting an enemy with this weapon heals the wielder for [1] - but they gain a stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PLA_MENTAL_STRAIN_1">Mental Strain</LSTag> if they don't continue hitting an enemy each turn. Upon gaining 3 stacks the wielder goes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLAIL_MADNESS">Mad</LSTag> for 5 turns. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PLA_MENTAL_STRAIN_1">Mental Strain</LSTag> stacks and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLAIL_MADNESS">Madness</LSTag> can be cured with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CalmEmotions">Calm Emotions</LSTag>.

Indulged its lust for violence.

Yeenoghu's Gift won't inflict the creature with Mental Strain.
Mental Strain
This entity has indulged in its bloodlust once and is now holding back from going <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLAIL_MADNESS">Mad</LSTag>.
Extreme Mental Stress

This entity has indulged a bit too much, its barely holding back from going <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLAIL_MADNESS">Mad</LSTag>. One more stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PLA_MENTAL_STRAIN_1">Mental Strain</LSTag> it will go <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLAIL_MADNESS">Mad</LSTag>.
BOOOAL's Torment
On hit with this weapon, inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> on enemies with more than 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Sacrifice for BOOOAL
After hitting an enemy with this weapon, if its <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> are less than its Level it automatically dies.
Large Lungs
While using this weapon, the wearer gets an extra dragonborn breath weapon charge. Recharges on <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Hold It

When hitting an enemy with more than 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it must make a DC [1] Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag>.
Holy Tenacity
Ancient Absorption
When hit by an enemy spell, use your reaction to grant yourself <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Thunder damage for 2 turns.
Creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Thunder damage for 2 turns.
Additional Oath Charge
You gain 1 additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charge</LSTag>.
Recite your Oath to regain all of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charge</LSTag>.
Additional Bardic Inspiration
You gain 1 additional <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BARDIC_INSPIRATION">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>.
Tailored Armour
The wearer gets <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>, resisting movement reduction.
Blue Flowers, Red Thorns
The wearer gets <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Wall of Thorns.

You gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> after casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>. While those temporary hit points are active reduce all incoming damage by [2].(HP Scales with Level)
Mind over Matter
Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1] based off your spellcasting modifier.(Minimum 0 Damage)
On a scale of Spruce to Oak
While you have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BARKSKIN">Barkskin</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag>.
Aura of Hate
The paladin and any nearby fiends and undead deal an additional [1] to damage dealt with melee weapons.
The wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_CHARGE">Arcane Charge</LSTag> whenever they are threatened.
Taste of Slaughter
When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, you gain [1].(Scales with Level)
When an enemy damages the wearer, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for [1] turn.
Adrenaline
When an enemy damages the wearer, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for [1] turn.
Familiar Armour
Once per turn, while the wearer has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> they can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Action">Sprint</LSTag>.
Dark Lady's Shroud
This armor grants the wearer <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIELD_OF_FAITH">Shield of Faith</LSTag>.
Shar's Chosen
While sneaking this user is always obscured.
Dark Beginnings
On combat start, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">Greater Invisibility</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Not Feeling Any Pain
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Drunk</LSTag> you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag>.
How's The Weather
When worn by a dwarf,gnome, or halfling, the wearer becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE">Enlarged</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire, Cold, and Force damage. You also gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire and Cold damage. You also gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Nature's Favor
The wearer gets <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Spike Growth.
Everwinter
Devilish Dodge
The wearer adds their Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. (minimum 1 additional Armour Class)
Radiantly Armoured
Reduce incoming physical damage by your <LSTag Tooltip="StrengthModifier">Strength Modifier</LSTag>.
Magical Material
Reduce incoming physical damage by your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>.
On a successful <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or dodge against a foe's spell, deal [1] to them.
Menzoberranzan Momentum
While hiding, you gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> deal additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>.

At the beginning of the wearer's turn, the robe activates, granting them <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>.

Well-Liked and Well-Fortified: instead of dying, you have gained <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit point</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>.
Deadly Touch
Increase your melee spell damage by [1]. (Scales with Level)

If the item detects that the wearer is gith, they have Immunity to Psychic damage.

Whenever the wearer succeeds on a Saving Throw against a spell, they regain [1].(Health scales with Level)
Undead Armour Aura
Allied undead within [1] gain a +2 to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Undead Armour
Affected entity gains a +2 to its <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Speed Conduit
While the wearer has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>, gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
When dealing Fire damage, the wearer deals an additional [1]. (Scales with Level)
If you can Dodge a Warhammer

The wearer gains <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Blur">Blur</LSTag> for [1] turns upon entering combat, granting enemies <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> that target the wearer.
Whenever the wearer succeeds a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against a spell, they regain [1]. (Scales with Level)
When the wearer has 75% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less and is damaged by a melee attack, they deal [1] to the attacker.
Creatures have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> when resisting your attacks and spells.
Aura of Hope
Allies within [1] gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BeaconOfHope">Beacon of Hope</LSTag>.
Careful Footwork
When worn by a drow, become immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CATS_GRACE">Cat's Grace</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> (+[1]), to a maximum [2].

You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_BULLS_STRENGTH">Bull's Strength</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> score by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> (+[1]), to a maximum [2].
The wearer has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> as long as they have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
Oak Father's Protection
The wearer gains the benfits of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ProtectionFromEvilAndGood">Protection from Evil and Good</LSTag>.
Weave Conduit
The wearer deals an extra [1] with lightning spells and cantrips while they have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>. (Scales with Level)
When scoring a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or killing a hostile creature, the wearer gains [1] and regains [2]. (Scales with Level)
Unrewarded Motivation
At the start of combat, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag> for 2 turns.
Praise the Sun
Your Radiant damage spells and cantrips can possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banish</LSTag> Undead.
Meditate and rest yourself, regaining all of your lost <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag>.
You have resistance to Fire, Cold, and Lightning Damage.
Tempest's Wrath
Targeted Spells and Cantrips that deal damage create 2m pools of water on hit.
Rush ahead in a straight line. Requires the user have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag>.
When you are hit by a foe within [1], it takes [2].
Building Anger
Increase your Constitution by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>(+[1]), to a maximum [2].
Unique Ingredients
Your attacks ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison.
Cleric's Fury
Your leveled Spells deal additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="WisdomModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag>.
When you are hit by a foe within [1], it takes [2].
Armour Class
+[1] (Scales with Proficiency)
Phalanx Training
When hit by ranged attacks and spells reduce the incoming damage by your <LSTag Tooltip="StrengthModifier">Strength Modifier</LSTag>.
If the wielder bears the Absolute's Brand, they gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Duelling Shield
Balestrom's Chosen
Your melee attacks deal an extra [1], On a hit, cast a [2] wide water surface upon the target.
Reduce all incoming damage by [1]. When the wearer is struck by a melee attack, the attacker takes damage equal to your Strength or Dexterity Modifier. ([2])
Nova's Rebirth
Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>, when your hit points are reduced to 0, you regain [2]. Create a [1] wide explosion dealing [3] to all nearby creatures.
Barbed Bash

When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to deal [1] and possibly knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> unless they succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Immortal Knowledge
Spells deal an extra [1] damage to non-undead enemies.
Melee Expert
Damage taken from enemy melee attacks is reduced by 2.
Menethil's Devoted

If the wielder is at least a level [1] Cleric, they gain [2] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charge(s). If the wielder is not at least a level [1] Cleric they gain [2] Level [3] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell slots</LSTag>. They recharge on Long Rest.

Huddle behind your shield to increase your Armour Class by [1] and reap scorching retaliation upon melee attackers.

When targeted by a melee attack, the attacker takes [2].

Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to Armour Class.

When a melee attack targets it, deal [2] to the attacker.
Huddle behind your shield to increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1] and retaliate against melee attacks against you.
Take Cover!
Hunkered Down

Reduce your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 3 to protect up to [2] creatures. They gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and gain a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Shield_Wizard">Shield</LSTag> charge.
Gains a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Shield_Wizard">Shield</LSTag> charge.
Betrayed Strength

If the wielder is at least a level [1] Paladin, they gain [2] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> charge(s). If the wielder is not at least a level [1] Paladin they gain [2] Level [3] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell slots</LSTag>.
Impact Generator
When the wielder receives damage gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
Sentry's Vision
The wielder gains a +[1] to ranged weapon and spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

When you <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag>, hostile creatures in a [1] radius must succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or take [2] and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Feared</LSTag>. The targets receive half damage on a save.
Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to spell save <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> and spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> while threatened.
The wearer gains a +[1] bonus to spell save <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> and spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> while threatened.
When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, they also regain [1].(Scales with Level)

During combat, when the wearer starts their turn with 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Arcane Cannon
Fire's Rampage
Once per day, when you deal Fire damage with a levelled spell you gain a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Metamagic_Quickened">Quicken Spell</LSTag> charge to use in the same turn.
The entity gains the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Metamagic_Quickened">Quicken Spell</LSTag> once per day.
Any condition inflicted on a target, also applies [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Encrusted with Frost</LSTag>.
While Obscured by shadow, the wearer gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

As long as the affected entity remains obscured, the number it needs to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 2. This effect can stack.
Merregon Mask Aura

You are one, you are legion, without personality or individuality - born only to fight.

When within [1] of another creature wearing a merregon's mask, Strength and Dexterity increases by 1 and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma decrease by 1 per nearby mask.
Infernal Resistance
Reduce incoming damage from spells by [1].

At the start of combat, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag>.
Super Heated Weaponry
Whenever you deal [1] damage, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_SYNERGY">Arcane Synergy</LSTag> for 2 turns.
Thunderous Impacts
After dealing damage with an unarmed attack, the wearer gains a +[1] bonus to their spell save <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> until the end of their next turn.
Arcane Agility
Reduces incoming [1],[2], and [3] damage by your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Modifier</LSTag> ([4]).
The helmet heals you [1] at the beginning of every turn. (Scales with Level)
Battle General
Gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Dice</LSTag>.
One of Many
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on attacks against constructs.

Suffering is Short
Non-<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> healing spells restore an additional [1] when the wearer drops to half their hit points or lower.
Unbroken Binding
When throwing this weapon, deal an additional [1] and [2]. The weapon returns to your hand after being thrown
Danse Mortelle
Summon 4 Skeletons that fight alongside you for 10 turns.
Erratic Faith
Non-<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> Necrotic Spells deal an additional [1].
Fear of Death

Grant [1] nearby allied undead <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_UNDEAD_FEAR_STRIKES">Strikes of Fear</LSTag>, their attacks deal an additional [2] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frighten</LSTag> enemies.
Strikes of Fear
Attacks deal an additional [1] and can possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frighten</LSTag> enemies.
Darkest Night, Brightest Stars

Your weapon attacks deal an additional [1], and can possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> the enemy. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [2], and can possibly inflict a stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="UNARMED_HARM">Necrotic Contusion</LSTag>.
Necrotic Contusion
This entity has its maximum hitpoints reduce by [1] per stack gained. Stacks are removed after 3 turns without gaining additional stacks.
Between Life and Death
After dealing [1] or [2] apply one of the following effects.
Divine Protection
Death's Gift
After dealing [1], become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to [1] but <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to [2].
Illithid Levitation
If the user is infected by a tadpole and casts <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Flight</LSTag>, they gain an extra [1] movement for 1 turn. Can only trigger once per turn.
Nightsong's Blindness
Once Rescued from her prison, the Nightsong was blind to see the betrayal standing beside her. Freed for such a short time only to be locked back up when the reward was worth it.
Radiant Smites
Dealing damage with your smite spells inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> on the target for [1] turns.
Nightsong's Arrogance
The Nightsong's overconfidence in attempting to fight instead of flee from every battle. Her pride demanding her to fight alone was her downfall.
Betrayed Casting
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and Spells deal additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>.
Nightsong's Strength
The Nightsong's strength lead her to many victories, however it has lead to her greatest defeats.
Piercing Radiance
Your weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional [1] and ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">resistance</LSTag> to [2].
Nightsong's Travels
The Nightsong uses speed and aggression to surprise her foes. Its a shame what happens when they are expecting it and are prepared.
While active, you can spend a War Priest Charge to make an additional attack as a bonus action.

Affected entity's summoned creature summoned creature has Immunity to all physical damage but vulnerability to all elemental damage.

At the start of the summoned creature's turn, it must succeed a Wisdom Saving Throw or be driven Mad.
